value.title: 5 steps to configure Power BI Mobile apps with Intune
value.excerpt: I walk through how you can configure the Power BI Mobile app within Intune to deploy a managed mobile application for your enterprise organization. This approach can be used for either the iOS app or the Android app.   Configure and deploy mobile application management policies in the Microsoft Intune

value.title: 5 Things You Might Not Know About Power BI
value.excerpt: We've got 5 things you might not know about Power BI. value.title: API's, Prototyping, Size increase - Roundup #45
value.excerpt: Steve Howards looks at working with OData and OAuth with Power BI. Bill Anton looks at prototyping and comparing Power BI Desktop to Power Pivot/Excel. We also had a few updates from the Power BI team regarding Q&A working with direct connections via the enterprise gateway, Query Parameters and Templating

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript
